channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaning tree oposite laudrette, 12th January
item.description:
Water main burst under tree and now tree looks as if it is leaning. Thames Water attended on Sunday 11th Jan and had concerns it was unstable
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 65, Plender Street, St Pancras, Greater London

item.title: Sinking and damage round inspection hatch, 12th January
item.description:
Hello. This is at the jct of Alexandra Park Rd and Muswell Ave (northern half) beside the traffic island. The road surface seems to be sinking and cracking into a rather picturesque wave formation and I fear for the structures underground. Could you please have a look? Thanks! This issue isnâ€™t new but is getting slowly worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Alexandra Park Road, Muswell Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
